tool.name: qiime2 quality-filter q-score
tool.description: Quality filter based on sequence quality scores.

param.name: demux
param.label: demux: SampleData[SequencesWithQuality]¹ | SampleData[PairedEndSequencesWithQuality]² | SampleData[JoinedSequencesWithQuality]³
param.help: [required] The demultiplexed sequence data to be quality filtered.

param.name: min_quality
param.label: min_quality: Int
param.help: [default: 4] The minimum acceptable PHRED score. All PHRED scores less that this value are considered to be low PHRED scores.

param.name: quality_window
param.label: quality_window: Int
param.help: [default: 3] The maximum number of low PHRED scores that can be observed in direct succession before truncating a sequence read. Note that truncation is performed such that the entirety of the low quality window is truncated.

param.name: min_length_fraction
param.label: min_length_fraction: Float
param.help: [default: 0.75] Filter truncated reads whose length fraction (truncated length divided by original length) is less than or equal to this value.

param.name: max_ambiguous
param.label: max_ambiguous: Int
param.help: [default: 0] The maximum number of ambiguous (i.e., N) base calls. This is applied after trimming sequences based on `min_length_fraction`.

tool.help:
QIIME 2: quality-filter q-score =============================== Quality filter based on sequence quality scores.
Outputs: -------- :filtered_sequences.qza: The resulting quality-filtered sequences. :filter_stats.qza: Summary statistics of the filtering process.
|
Description: ------------ This method filters sequence based on quality scores and the presence of ambiguous base calls.
Examples: ---------
q_score ******* Using the ``qiime2 quality-filter q-score`` tool: #. Set *"demux"* to ``#: demuxed-seqs.qza`` #. Press the ``Execute`` button.
Once completed, for each new entry in your history, use the ``Edit`` button to set the name as follows: (Renaming is optional, but it will make any subsequent steps easier to complete.)
.. list-table:: :align: left :header-rows: 1
* - History Name - *"Name"* to set (be sure to press ``Save``) * - ``#: qiime2 quality-filter q-score [...] : filtered_sequences.qza`` - ``dumux-filtered.qza`` * - ``#: qiime2 quality-filter q-score [...] : filter_stats.qza`` - ``demux-filter-stats.qza``
|
